thread.title: Steve Jobs plays dual role of hero, villain in the movies
thread.title_full: Steve Jobs plays dual role of hero, villain in the movies

title: Steve Jobs plays dual role of hero, villain in the movies
text: > Entertainment Steve Jobs plays dual role of hero, villain in the movies FILE - This Wednesday, Aug. 29, 2012 file photo shows Hollywood actor Ashton Kutcher on set during the shooting for a biopic on the late Apple founder Steve Jobs, in Vrindavan, India. Kutcher didn't get an Oscar nomination for his interpretation of Jobs like some critics are already predicting that Fassbender will get, but give Kutcher credit for nailing a lot of the real man's mannerisms, including even the loping way he walked. (AP Photo, File)
